characters: A man in a dark blue jacket and black pants is riding a scooter. The man is wearing an orange vest. The man is approximately 40 years old.
summary: The vehicle is approaching an intersection. A man on a scooter is approaching the intersection from the left side. The man on the scooter is wearing a dark blue jacket, black pants, and an orange vest. The man on the scooter is not visible until he enters the intersection. The man on the scooter is traveling at a high rate of speed. The man on the scooter collides with the vehicle.
actions: The vehicle is approaching an intersection at a steady speed. The driver is likely maintaining speed to cross the intersection before the light changes. The driver does not appear to be slowing down or preparing to stop.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A man on a scooter, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly appearing from the left side of the intersection and colliding with the vehicle. The man is wearing a dark blue jacket, black pants, and an orange vest.
